Sentencas: Lanthanum apatite is one of the most promising materials as an electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs) which operate close to 700 degrees C. Here, we report the preparation and optimization of dense La10AlSi5O26.5 tapes obtained by the combination of tape casting technology and reaction sintering.
Titulo: Preparation of aluminium lanthanum oxyapatite tapes, La10AlSi5O26.5, by tape casting and reaction sintering

Sentencas: Homogeneous concentrated mixed suspensions of La2O3, Al2O3 and SiO2 were prepared in ethanol.
Titulo: Preparation of aluminium lanthanum oxyapatite tapes, La10AlSi5O26.5, by tape casting and reaction sintering

Sentencas: The effect of the solid loading, the binder content, ultrasound and the initial particle size of the materials onto the characteristics of the tapes (cracking, composition, microstructure and electrical properties) has been studied.
Titulo: Preparation of aluminium lanthanum oxyapatite tapes, La10AlSi5O26.5, by tape casting and reaction sintering

Sentencas: This study paves the way for further improvement in the processing of oxyapatite electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Preparation of aluminium lanthanum oxyapatite tapes, La10AlSi5O26.5, by tape casting and reaction sintering
